ResearchProjectDef.label: basic electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover rudimentary utilization of electricity. Unlocks building simple generators and lights.

ResearchProjectDef.label: telegraph
ResearchProjectDef.description: Decode the mysteries of telecommunication. The telegraph allows contact with other communities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: siege weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Exploration of complex weapon designs allows colonists to begin creating designs for heavy weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: weaponized electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to use electricity as a weapon. Unlocks slow but powerful arc weapons that can stun enemies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arc tower patent
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build Arc Towers which electrocute and stun enemies. Build at the machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: steam engine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develops an understanding of the creation of energy through the use of large steam engines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: oil generator patent
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colonists to construct oil generators which produce a great amount of power but burn out fast.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval medical care
ResearchProjectDef.description: New means to set up your medical area medieval style.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial medical care
ResearchProjectDef.description: Setting up a hospital area in your colony with these instruments will increase your colonists chances of survival. New means to set up your medical area somewhat civilized.
